ThingDef.label: Weathered Iron Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Iron Ore. Iron Ore has a variety of uses as an economic metal, being abundant and easy to process. It can be strengthened by being mixed with other metals into alloys.

ThingDef.label: Solid Iron Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Iron Ore. Iron Ore has a variety of uses as an economic metal, being abundant and easy to process. It can be strengthened by being mixed with other metals into alloys.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Silver Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Silver Ore. Silver Ore is useful as the primary currency for trading.

ThingDef.label: Solid Silver Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Silver Ore. Silver Ore is useful as the primary currency for trading.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Gold Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Gold Ore. Gold Ore is a very valuable and precious metal. The allure of this rare beautiful metal is known to bring out terrible greed in people.

ThingDef.label: Solid Gold Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Gold Ore. Gold Ore is a very valuable and precious metal. The allure of this rare beautiful metal is known to bring out terrible greed in people.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Nitre Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Nitre. Major uses of potassium nitrate are in fertilizers, tree stump removal, rocket propellants and fireworks. It is one of the major components of gunpowder.

ThingDef.label: Solid Nitre Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Nitre. Major uses of potassium nitrate are in fertilizers, tree stump removal, rocket propellants and fireworks. It is one of the major components of gunpowder.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Anglesite Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Anglesite. Anglesite is the ore form of Lead. It is a heavy metal that is denser than most common materials. Lead is soft and malleable, and has a relatively low melting point.

ThingDef.label: Solid Anglesite Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Anglesite. Anglesite is the ore form of Lead. It is a heavy metal that is denser than most common materials. Lead is soft and malleable, and has a relatively low melting point.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Coal Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Coal Ore. Coal is useful as a reaction agent in metal alloy production.

ThingDef.label: Solid Coal Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Deposits of Coal Ore. Coal is useful as a reaction agent in metal alloy production.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Nickel Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic nickel ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Nickel Ore contains Nickel and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Solid Nickel Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic nickel ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Nickel Ore contains Nickel and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Tin Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Tin ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Tin Ore contains Tin and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Solid Tin Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Tin ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Tin Ore contains Tin and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Copper Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Copper ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Copper Ore contains Copper and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Solid Copper Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Copper ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Copper Ore contains Copper and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Aluminum Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Aluminium ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Aluminium Ore contains Aluminium and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Solid Aluminum Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Lateritic Aluminium ore deposits are surficial, weathered rinds formed on ultramafic rocks. Aluminium Ore contains Aluminium and small amounts of Cobalt.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Jade Deposits
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of jade.

ThingDef.label: Solid Jade Deposits
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of jade.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Ilmenite Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Ilmenite is the ore of Titanium. Titanium is a very durable metal and is often used in alloys to produce metals much stronger than steel.

ThingDef.label: Solid Titanium Deposits
ThingDef.description: Ilmenite is the ore of Titanium. Titanium is a very durable metal and is often used in alloys to produce metals much stronger than steel.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Pyrolusite Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Pyrolusite is the ore of Maganese. Maganese is a metal with high magnetism.

ThingDef.label: Solid Pyrolusite Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Pyrolusite is the ore of Maganese. Maganese is a metal with high magnetism.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Wolframite Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Wolframite is the ore of Tungsten. Tungsten is a strong and quite dense material with a high melting temperature used for electric filaments and armor-piercing ammunition, as well as hard tungsten carbide machine tools.

ThingDef.label: Solid Wolframite Ore Deposits
ThingDef.description: Wolframite is the ore of Tungsten. Tungsten is a strong and quite dense material with a high melting temperature used for electric filaments and armor-piercing ammunition, as well as hard tungsten carbide machine tools.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Glowstone Deposit
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of a strange glowing gem.

ThingDef.label: Solid Glowstone Deposit
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of a strange glowing gem.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Coldstone Deposit
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of a strangely cold gem.

ThingDef.label: Solid Coldstone Deposit
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of a strangely cold gem.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Salt Deposit
ThingDef.description: Salt compacted over time..

ThingDef.label: Solid Salt Deposit
ThingDef.description: Salt compacted over time..

ThingDef.label: Weathered compacted machinery
ThingDef.description: Ancient machinery, compacted over time. Can be mined for useful components.

ThingDef.label: Solid compacted machinery
ThingDef.description: Ancient machinery, compacted over time. Can be mined for useful components. This deposite has been protected from the elements for a long time.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Amber Deposit
ThingDef.description: Ancient tree sap that has been preserved. Sometimes it has small creatures inside it. A soft resin that polishes up beautifully.

ThingDef.label: Solid Amber Deposit
ThingDef.description: Ancient tree sap that has been preserved. Sometimes it has small creatures inside it. A soft resin that polishes up beautifully.

ThingDef.label: Weathered Uranium Deposits
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of uranium.

ThingDef.label: Solid Uranium Deposits
ThingDef.description: Rock containing bits of uranium.
